titleStmt.title: Sermons preached by that reverend and learned divine Richard Clerke, Dr. in Divinitie; sometimes fellovv of Christ Colledge in Cambridge. One of the most learned translators of our English Bible; preacher in the famous metropolitan church of Christ, Canterbury. Since his death, published for the common good, by Charles White, Mr. in Arts, and one of the six preachers of Christ Church, Canterbury
titleStmt.author: Clerke, Richard, d. 1634.
White, Charles, d. 1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Cotes, for Thomas Alchorn, and are to be sold at his shoppe at the signe of the Greene Dragon in S. Pauls Church yard,
